rules_text:
Nonbasic lands target player controls don't untap during that player's next untap step.
Fabled {3}{R} [i](Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that player.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player taps a nonbasic land they control, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text2:
[i]“The sky itself wept at the sight—and for a moment, the world stopped to mourn with it.”
—Hemley Eggfeather[/i]
